inputs.name: workloadIdentityServiceConnection
inputs.label: 'Azure DevOps' Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is an 'Azure DevOps' Service Connection. Not compatable with mavenServiceConnections.

inputs.name: artifactsFeeds
inputs.label: Feeds
inputs.helpMarkdown: Select one or multiple feeds to authenticate. If 'azureDevOpsServiceConnection' is used, these can be internal or cross-org feed names, otherwise these should just be internal feed names.

inputs.name: mavenServiceConnections
inputs.label: Credentials for repositories outside this organization/collection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Credentials to use for external repositories located in the project's pom.xml.
